item.title: Its rather typical August weather despite the Atlantic Hurricane
Air Force Reserve aircraft sees the eye of Hurricane Erin
item.description: Air Force Reserve aircraft sees the eye of Hurricane Erin

item.title: Local businesses meet to discuss new affordable, employer-based housing in Manatee County
item.description: It's called 'Forest Cove' and it will feature over 150 apartments.

item.title: School Board opens feedback survey ahead of decision for superintendent of Manatee County Schools
item.description: The board’s decision is scheduled for Tuesday, Aug. 26.

item.title: Purple Ribbon Committee issues report on recommendations on future of the Van Wezel
item.description: The City Commission voted unanimously to accept the committee’s recommendations.

item.title: Watch: Hurricane hunters fly into the eye of Hurricane Erin
item.description: “Last night, we flew into the eye of Hurricane Erin—and captured the breathtaking stadium effect,“ the post said

item.title: Dengue Fever case confirmed in Hillsborough County
item.description: Residents should protect themselves from mosquito bites and eliminate standing water.

item.title: Lady Tornadoes writing new chapter with Angie Byrd as head volleyball coach
item.description: The high school volleyball season is getting underway on the Suncoast, and the Lady Tornadoes at Booker High School are ready to shock the world.

item.title: ERIN still major hurricane
item.description: SARASOTA, Fla. (WWSB) - Hurricane Erin is now a category 4 hurricane again with winds up to 140 mph. It is expected to stay a major hurricane for the next couple of days.

item.title: Amber alert issued for two Riviera Beach children
item.description: A Florida Amber Alert has been issued for two children from Riviera Beach.

item.title: New head of Sarasota County’s stormwater department is on the job
item.description: Ben Quartermaine took the job as director of the county’s stormwater department Aug. 11.

item.title: Could Fernand be close behind Erin
item.description: There is something behind it that we will be watching closely next week.
